items.title: Sarbanes-Oxley (SOX) Testing

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course focuses on the validation of operation, which is executed through a test of control within Sarbanes-Oxley.
objectives_summary: Identify methods to ensure the proper controls are selected for testing.
Identify the variance between key controls and secondary controls.
Understand and execute testing procedures for design and operating effectiveness of controls.

items.title: Establishing a Methodology for Risk Based Auditing

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course focuses on the establishment of a framework or methodology for risk based auditing.
objectives_summary: Identify some of the various challenges internal audit may face when attempting to execute upon risk based auditing.
Explore alternatives to identifying risk appetite and risk tolerance to utilize within risk based auditing.
Evaluate the development and usage of a variety of risk management characteristics when identifying risk tolerance.

items.title: Anti Money Laundering (AML) - Become a Subject Matter Expert
items.headline: Become a Subject Matter Expert on PEP Risk Within 1 hour - Financial Crime Compliance
objectives_summary: What are PEPs and PEP Associates
Anti Bribery and Corruption (ABC) & Terrorist Financing risks associated with PEPs
Learn How Financial Institutions Source PEP Data

items.title: Applying the Standards for Internal Auditors Part 1

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course delves deeper into the major components of the IPPF Standards and their meaning to the profession.
objectives_summary: Explore the mission of Internal Audit (IA) as defined by the Institute of Internal Auditors (IIA).
Explore the Mandatory Guidance and core principles as identified by the Institute of Internal Auditors Standards.
Explore the IA Code of Ethics as defined by the Institute of Internal Auditors.

items.title: COSO 2013 Risk Assessment Compliance

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course explores the 4 basic principles of the Risk Assessment component of COSO 2013.
objectives_summary: Defining Risk Assessment component for COSO 2013.
Examining the four principles supporting the risk assessment component..
Articulation of the 32 Points of focus that supports the four principles of the risk assessment component.

items.title: Operationalizing COSO

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course examines the COSO attributes and 17 components and speak to what procedures need to be considered.
objectives_summary: Explore the driving force behind the 2013 Committee of Sponsoring Organizations (COSO) Internal Control Framework and suggested applications beyond Internal Control Over Financial Reporting (ICFR).
Discover the benefits of applying the COSO framework to the entire organization.
Identify each of the COSO attributes and principles and recognize their application to operational and compliance processes.

items.title: Country Risk in the Age of Global Turbulences
items.headline: Managing Country Risk to turn uncertainty into opportunity
objectives_summary: Students will be able to assess and better predict country risk volatility and be aware of the wide range of country risk information sources

items.title: IFRS 9 - Basics To Expert
items.headline: IFRS 9
objectives_summary: Understand IFRS 9 & Develop Expertise In IFRS 9, Get Insights On Practical Aspects Of AS 9

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course provides a deeper understanding of the requirements behind SOX 302.
objectives_summary: Discover background Section 302 requirements.
Explore other disclosure requirements.
Identify disclosure controls and procedures.

items.title: Suspicious Transaction Report Narrative
items.headline: How to write a qualitative AML Report
objectives_summary: Student will learn what a suspicion is and what a narrative is
Learn how to explain suspicion in a clear logical process
Why your suspicious reports (STR/SAR) never make any impart

items.title: AML Case Investigation Skills
items.headline: A guide to conducting AML case investigations, writing quality case narratives and the submission of STRs (STR filing)
objectives_summary: Latest AML and Compliance related cases around the world along with fines and penalties imposed
The AML Transaction Monitoring Process
How to identify Red flags and Suspicious Activity in financial institutions

items.title: Accounting 101: International Financial Reporting Standards
items.headline: Learn about International Financial Reporting Standards IFRS and how they differ from US GAAP Accounting for 2021
objectives_summary: Learn From A Top Rated Instructor Who Has Been Teaching On Udemy Since 2013 and Taught Over 100,000 Students!
Why US Accountants Need To Learn IFRS
GAAP vs IFRS

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course explores the key competencies and responsibilities of today's internal audit management.
objectives_summary: Explore the role of today's internal audit leadership.
Recognize the role of internal audit in corporate governance.
Explore how to synergize the internal audit processes with other quality assurance groups.

items.headline: This course provides an overview of the important concepts of COSO 2013.
objectives_summary: Explore the definition of Internal Control (IC) and its importance in today’s business.
Explore reason for COSO update and dissect key changes.
Discover the basic tenants of Internal Control (IC).

items.title: Anti-Money Laundering (AML) Fundamentals
items.headline: A guide to basic concepts essential for those looking for a career or to develop their skills in AML Compliance
objectives_summary: Basic concepts needed in the AML and compliance field
Methods of Money Laundering
Risks of Money Laundering and its impact on the global economy

items.title: Detect and Prevent Employee Fraud

visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course provides practical knowledge about common corporate fraud activity, and how to detect it.
objectives_summary: Discover the breadth and depth of the fraud problem.
Identify the motives of internal fraudsters.
Be able to explain the mechanics of specific fraud schemes.
